They are a preferred consulting and implementation partner for ORACLE NETSUITE, SAGE ERP, and ZOHO CRM, globally assisting a diverse client base from start-ups and SMEs to MNCs and government agencies. Their offerings are designed to accelerate digital transformations, enhance operational efficiency, and improve business performance. Within HR technology, NuVista provides solutions across Recruiting, Talent Management, Onboarding, and Career Management software, with a focus on boosting hiring manager confidence and productivity, and enabling faster, more efficient talent acquisition. Their service model emphasizes dedicated specialists, an integrated operating approach with customized KPIs, and pertinent market intelligence to ensure client success.
